TEXT.TITLE: BIOTHERAPEUTICS <BITX> IN NASDAQ EXPANSION
TEXT.BODY: Biotherapeutics Inc said its common stock will be included in the NASDAQ National Market System starting April Seven. As a result, it said the stock will become marginable. Reuter
